thread.title: BRIEF-Former Colorado Resources CEO Says Intends To Propose 5 Director Candidates For Election To Co's Board

title: BRIEF-Former Colorado Resources CEO Says Intends To Propose 5 Director Candidates For Election To Co's Board

organizations.name: election to co's board reuters staff

text: March 7, 2018 / 10:39 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Former Colorado Resources CEO Says Intends To Propose 5 Director Candidates For Election To Co's Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 7 (Reuters) - Colorado Resources Ltd: * FORMER CEO ADAM TRAVIS SAYS INTENDS TO PROPOSE 5 DIRECTOR CANDIDATES FOR ELECTION TO BOARD OF COLORADO RESOURCES AT ANNUAL SHAREHOLDERS MEETING * ADAM TRAVIS SAYS PROPOSED NOMINEES, ADAM TRAVIS, HIS FAMILY, HOLD ABOUT 5.2 PERCENT SHARES OF COLORADO RESOURCES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
